translation.en: What the hell?
This way! This way! Whoo- hoo!
Thus has it always been, and thus shall it ever be.
translation.es: Así ha sido siempre, y así ha de ser.

translation.en: Do not weep for me For I have not gone
translation.es: No llores por mí, pues no me he ido.

translation.en: I am the wind that shakes the mighty oak
translation.es: Soy el viento que sacude al fuerte roble.

translation.en: I am the gentle rain That falls upon your face
translation.es: Soy la suave lluvia que cae sobre tu rostro.

translation.en: I am the spring flower That pushes through the dark earth
translation.es: Soy la flor de primavera que empuja la tierra oscura.

translation.en: I am the chuckling laughter Of the mountain stream
translation.es: Soy la risa risueña del arroyo en la montaña.

translation.en: Yea, though I walk through the valley
translation.es: Sí, aunque ande en el valle

translation.en: of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
translation.es: de sombra de muerte, no temeré mal alguno.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
translation.es: Tu vara y tu cayado me infundirán aliento.

translation.en: We commit our brother to the ground.
Earth to earth,
ashes to ashes,
dust to dust.
- Maya Stern. - Military?
No. I'm in fancy dress.
Me too. Penguin.
- - Very convincing.
So, seeing as we're both here at this ridiculous charity party,
translation.es: Ya que ambos vinimos a esta ridícula fiesta de caridad,

translation.en: would you allow me to buy you a drink?
What, from the free bar?
Have whatever you want. My treat.
translation.es: Pide lo que quieras. Yo invito.

translation.en: I should warn you,
in 11 hours, I'll be on a plane back to base.
translation.es: dentro de 11 horas, estaré volando de regreso a la base.

translation.en: Well, in that case, we'd better make the most of the time that we have,
translation.es: En ese caso, aprovechemos el tiempo que tenemos,

translation.en: Captain.
No! Joe!
Joe! Joe, Joe!
Come on, darling.
- You okay? - Yeah, thanks, Shane.
- Detective Kierce. - Oh, Maya, these are excellent.
What are they? Vol- au- vents?
What, you've come for the catering? Or you've found my husband's killer?
translation.es: ¿Vino a comer? ¿O encontró al asesino de mi esposo?

translation.en: Ah, Joe's mum invited me.
translation.es: Me invitó la mamá de Joe.

translation.en: Oh. Well, you'd think a psychiatrist would know better.
translation.es: Pensé que una psiquiatra sería más sensata.

translation.en: Not today, but there's some things I need to follow up on, about the attack.
translation.es: Hoy no, pero necesito saber algunas cosas sobre el ataque.

translation.en: Look, I have given you three statements, and you're no closer to catching them.
translation.es: Ya hice tres declaraciones, y no está más cerca de atraparlos.

translation.en: Your shoelace, it's undone.
Why did you invite that detective?
I wanted him to see who Joe was.
translation.es: Quería que viera quién era Joe.

translation.en: That he was important.
That he was loved by his brothers and sister.
translation.es: Que sus hermanos y su hermana lo amaban.

translation.en: That he grew up in this big house
translation.es: Que creció en esta casa grande

translation.en: where he spent his childhood.
How are you coping?
I'm grieving.
I lost the love of my life.
translation.es: Perdí al amor de mi vida.

translation.en: No, I'm grieving.
There's something more going on with you.
translation.es: A ti te pasa algo más.

translation.en: I'm fine.
I don't want to push you today, but I think you should get help.
translation.es: No quiero presionarte hoy, pero deberías buscar ayuda.

translation.en: There's so much you're dealing with. First, you lose your sister.
translation.es: Estás lidiando con muchas cosas. Primero perdiste a tu hermana.

translation.en: Now, Joe.
And all that army business.
translation.es: Y lo que pasó en el ejército.

translation.en: I'd better attend to the guests.
translation.es: Iré a atender a los invitados.

translation.en: Whose idea was hymns?
Who do you think?
I must have told them ten times, play The Doors,
translation.es: Les habré dicho diez veces que pusieran The Doors

translation.en: play… Nirvana.
Play Nirvana? At a funeral?
- Do you know how much they spent? - Go on.
The coffin cost more than your car.
translation.es: El ataúd costó más que tu auto.

translation.en: Well, that's not saying much.
I don't want to leave you.
I'll be fine.
Look, I know you think you will,
but I don't care if it's 3:00 in the morning,
translation.es: pero aunque sean las tres de la mañana,

translation.en: if you have a wobble… yeah?
Oh, which reminds me.
- I've got something for you. - Oh?
It is…
a digital picture frame.
It rotates photos of you and your family.
translation.es: Rota fotos de ti y tu familia.

translation.en: Okay…
I've already pre- loaded some of you, Joe, Lily, and the family.
translation.es: Ya cargué algunas de ti, Joe, Lily y la familia.

translation.en: Except, that's not all it is.
Ready?
Do you want to see that funky move again? Please.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres volver a ver eso? - Por favor.

translation.en: Well, you can. It's all caught on here, on a secret camera,
translation.es: Bueno, puedes. Quedó grabado aquí, en una cámara secreta

translation.en: which records when there's movement.
Why have you got me a secret camera?
So you can keep an eye on Lily when you're not here.
translation.es: Para que puedas vigilar a Lily cuando no estés aquí.

translation.en: - When she's with Izabella? - Exactly. Nanny cam.
translation.es: - ¿Mientras está con Izabella? - Exacto. Una cámara oculta.

translation.en: I'm sure Izabella's great, but what harm does it do to keep an eye on her?
translation.es: Seguro que Izabella es genial, pero ¿qué daño hace vigilarla?

translation.en: Eva, her family's and Joe's go way back.
translation.es: Eva, su familia y Joe se conocen hace mucho.

translation.en: Well, I am putting it in her playroom.
translation.es: La pondré en su cuarto de juegos.

translation.en: - Hi. - Morning.
Ready for your next lesson? - Yeah, can't wait. - Let's go.
translation.es: - ¿Listo para la clase? Vamos. - Sí, ansioso.

translation.en: Okay, you can take her up today.
Okay?
If you'd like to take a slight turn to the left.
translation.es: Gira un poco a la izquierda.

translation.en: Okay, will do.
That's good.
Right. Keep-- Keep your eyes on the horizon.
translation.es: Mantén la mirada en el horizonte.

translation.en: That's a nasty graze to his elbow there.
Is that what they teach military police? - I was aiming for his elbow. - Ah.
translation.es: - ¿Eso le enseñan a la policía militar? - Apunté al codo.

translation.en: Want a turn?
No. Wouldn't want to embarrass you.
How long have you been back at work?
- Three days. - Right.
- What? - Nothing.
What am I supposed to do?
Sit at home, stare at a wall?
No, but, you know…
Lily?
It's my grief, Shane.
- We need some normality. - Okay.
Listen, me and the guys, we were talking…
- Oh, go on. - How about we come over this weekend?
translation.es: - Dime. - ¿Y si vamos este fin de semana?

translation.en: Nothing crazy. Just a few drinks. Keep you company.
translation.es: Nada loco. Unos tragos. Te haremos compañía.

translation.en: So, it's too soon for me to be back in work,
translation.es: ¿Es demasiado pronto para volver al trabajo,

translation.en: - but not for a piss- up, hmm? -
Hello?
- - Mummy!
- Hey! Good girl. -
- Hi! - Hi, Maya. Hi. Has everything been all right?
Of course. We've had fun, haven't we, Lily? Yeah?
We made…
- Angels. - Yeah, that's right.
You made angels?
- Why don't you show Mummy? - Go on. Go on.
- Come. Come with me. - You go in. One minute.
translation.es: Ven conmigo. Ve tú. Enseguida voy.

translation.en: - - She's been talking about heaven, so I-- Yeah, no, it's fine. It's fine.
translation.es: - Estuvo hablando del cielo, así que… - Sí, está bien.

translation.en: Listen, you get off, um…
It's fine. I'm going to, uh, look at these amazing angels.
translation.es: Está bien. Iré a ver a esos increíbles ángeles.

translation.en: See you, darling.
Oh, clever girl!
Wow, show me. Show me.
- I'm winning. - Oh, big girl.
Ready…
Wow.
Right, Lily.
Right, breakfast. Go and sit down.
Go and sit in your chair.
Good girl. Here.
Hi, Judith. Listen, I'm just rushing off to work.
translation.es: Hola, Judith. Me estoy yendo a trabajar.

translation.en: Can I call you back?
I thought you could come over to Farnwood this weekend with Lily.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vienen a Farnwood este fin de semana?

translation.en: That's kind of you, um, but I can't this weekend.
translation.es: Eres muy amable, pero no puedo. Vendrán unos amigos.

translation.en: - I've arranged to see friends. - She spent a lot of time here, Maya,
translation.es: Eres muy amable, pero no puedo. Vendrán unos amigos. Lily venía mucho aquí cuando tú no estabas.

translation.en: when you were away.
translation.es: Lily venía mucho aquí cuando tú no estabas.

translation.en: I know you're not used to being a full- time mother,
translation.es: No estás acostumbrada a ocuparte sola,

translation.en: but children need their routines.
Yeah, I know. I know.
Listen, why don't I call you later and we can arrange another day?
translation.es: Te llamaré más tarde así arreglamos para otro día.

translation.en: Okay. Yes. Call me later.
I'm only thinking about what's best for Lily.
translation.es: Solo pienso en lo mejor para Lily.

translation.en: All right, bye.
Unbelievable.
- Did you see Daddy? - Dada.
Did you see Daddy yesterday when I wasn't here?
translation.es: ¿Lo viste ayer cuando yo no estaba?

translation.en: He came over, and he-- and he gave you a cuddle, and he sat you on his lap?
translation.es: ¿Se acercó, te abrazó y te sentó en su regazo?

translation.en: Okay. All right, Mommy's being silly. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Está bien, es una tontería de mamá. Lo siento.

translation.en: Fuck.
Mrs. Burkett?
Can I speak with you?
- Now? - Yes, now.
I need to show you something.
What is this?
It's a camera.
- You record me? - Just watch.
- You're spying on me? - Right, just watch, watch.
- How do you explain this? - I don't know what you mean.
That man there, you saw him. You saw who that was?
translation.es: Tú viste a ese hombre. ¿Viste quién era?

translation.en: - Who? - What do you mean, Who?
- It's Joe! How the hell can that be? - Please, Mrs. Burkett, you're scaring me!
translation.es: - ¡Es Joe! ¿Cómo es posible? - Por favor, me asusta.

translation.en: Look. It's fucking Joe.
- He's dead, Izabella. - You're hurting me.
He's dead, and he's there on the camera whilst you were in the house.
translation.es: Está muerto y quedó filmado mientras tú estabas en la casa.

translation.en: Momma!
It's all right, darling. Just go back in and watch your show.
translation.es: Está bien, cariño. Sigue mirando tu programa.

translation.en: Go on. It's all right. It's okay.
translation.es: Ve. No pasa nada. Está bien.

translation.en: I want answers.
I need some water.
- Ow! Fuck! -
What the hell happened?
Got pepper sprayed.
- Pepper sprayed? - Yeah, by my nanny.
Are you serious?
No. No, I'm a gifted comedian.
Nothing warms up a crowd like the pepper spray nanny routine.
translation.es: Mi mejor número es la niñera del gas pimienta.

translation.en: All right, Maya. That's a serious offense.
translation.es: Maya, eso es un delito grave.

translation.en: Oh God.
You okay?
Can I ask what prompted it?
I saw something on my nanny cam, and I challenged her about it.
translation.es: Vi algo en mi cámara oculta y le pregunté.

translation.en: Okay. What did you see?
- It's going to sound crazy. - Try me.
It's gone.
- Gone? - Yeah, the SD card is gone.
translation.es: - ¿No está? - La tarjeta SD no está.

translation.en: - All right. - She must have taken it.
translation.es: - Bueno. - Se la habrá llevado ella.

translation.en: - After she pepper sprayed you? - Yes.
So, what was on it?
Joe. So it was, uh…
- It was an old tape. - No, it wasn't. It was from yesterday.
translation.es: - Era una cinta vieja. - No. Era de ayer.

translation.en: - You know that-- You know that can't be. - He was wearing his green shirt.
translation.es: Sabe que eso es imposible. Llevaba su camisa verde. No está en su guardarropa. Ni sus zapatos.

translation.en: That's not in his wardrobe. Or his shoes.
translation.es: Llevaba su camisa verde. No está en su guardarropa. Ni sus zapatos.

translation.en: Are you sure it was Joe, Maya?
He went to Lily, and she cuddled him.
translation.es: Se acercó a Lily, y ella lo abrazó.

translation.en: Did you ask Lily?
She said he wasn't here.
You know…
- Grief can do funny things. - It's not grief.
translation.es: - El dolor tiene efectos extraños. - No es dolor.

translation.en: - I'm sorry. - No, it's all right.
Look, I'm fine. I'm just…
- Okay. - You wanted to ask me a few questions?
Yeah, if you're okay now.
Thanks.
In your original statement on the night of the attack,
translation.es: En su declaración original de la noche del ataque,

translation.en: you said two masked youths appeared in the park on scramble bikes.
translation.es: dijo que dos jóvenes enmascarados llegaron al parque en motocicletas.

translation.en: Yeah.
And then you said they stopped in front of you
translation.es: Y que luego se detuvieron frente a usted

translation.en: and attempted to grab your bag.
Correct.
Right, and then, um…
And then you said…
I resisted. A fight broke out.
Um, one of them had hold of my bag, he wouldn't let go, and I, uh, was pushed.
translation.es: Uno de ellos tomó mi bolso, no lo soltaba, y me empujó.

translation.en: I fell backwards.
They were demanding that Joe handed over his wallet, and he wouldn't.
translation.es: Querían que Joe les diera su billetera, y él no lo hizo.

translation.en: Then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
translation.es: Entonces, de repente, de la nada,

translation.en: he pulled out a gun.
I tried to call for help.
But before I could, I just heard…
By the time I got to Joe…
he was on the floor.
Dying.
Joe! Joe, Joe, Joe…
Besides a very detailed description of the suspects,
translation.es: Además de describir muy bien a los sospechosos,

translation.en: you were able to tell us that the youth in the red Nike trainers
translation.es: pudo decirnos que el joven con zapatillas Nike rojas

translation.en: was carrying a 9- millimeter Glock 17. Now…
that's very impressive.
To identify a weapon like that.
I was issued one. Overseas.
translation.es: Me dieron una en el extranjero.

translation.en: Do you miss the army?
I loved combat.
The adrenaline. The fear.
It was addictive.
But that's all over now.
As you know, despite never finding the weapon itself,
translation.es: Como sabe, aunque nunca encontramos el arma,

translation.en: we recovered three bullets from your husband's body
translation.es: recuperamos tres balas del cuerpo de su esposo

translation.en: and three cases from the scene consistent with a Glock 17.
translation.es: y tres casquillos de la escena, de una Glock 17.

translation.en: Now, you own guns, don't you, Maya?
Yes.
Do you keep any of them here?
They're in here.
No one can get their hands on them, especially Lily.
translation.es: Nadie puede tocarlas, sobre todo no Lily.

translation.en: Well, how do you open it?
Thumbprint.
Wow.
That's, uh, quite the collection. Does anyone else have access to these?
translation.es: Es una gran colección. ¿Alguien más tiene acceso a esto?

translation.en: No. Well, Joe used to. But…
What's that?
It's old.
Deactivated.
- Glock 17? - Yeah.
- Is this your only handgun? - Yep. The only one.
translation.es: ¿Es su única arma corta? Sí. La única.

translation.en: And it's legally registered as deactivated.
translation.es: Y está registrada legalmente como desactivada.

translation.en: As I'm sure you already know.
So shall we stop playing games and you tell me what it is that you want?
translation.es: ¿Dejamos de jugar y me dice qué quiere?

translation.en: What I want, Maya,
is to go away and test it. Go on.
- What, you think I killed my husband? - No, Maya.
translation.es: - ¿Cree que yo maté a mi esposo? - No, Maya.

translation.en: You buried him. I was there.
So he wasn't on the nanny cam.
translation.es: Así que no estaba en el video.

translation.en: Hi.
Hiya, sweetheart. How was your day?
Yeah, good. Well, I say good.
I had a six- year- old say bellend this morning.
translation.es: Hoy un niño de seis años dijo estúpido.

translation.en: - - Had to ring his parents.
- And were they bellends? - Most definitely.
So, tonight, you got your dancing shoes ready?
Of course.
Right, and don't forget, 6:00 p.m.
Yeah? And it's side together, side tap, side together. Yes?
translation.es: Y es: juntos a un lado, piso, piso, juntos a un lado. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Love you.
Love you too. Bye.
And there's a board members' call at 2:45.
translation.es: Y hay una llamada con la junta a las 2:45.

translation.en: - It's in your diary. - Mm. Joy of joys.
translation.es: Está en su agenda. Qué alegría.

translation.en: Excuse me.
Oh. Daughter- in- law.
Reconsidering my offer?
No, um…
I need to ask you something about Joe.
What is it?
When you, uh… when you went to see him…
- to… identify his body… -
Yes?
What did he look like?
Why on earth would you ask me that?
What did he look like? What sort of a question is that, Maya?
Because I never saw his body.
Maya, please. I urge you to think again about counseling.
translation.es: Maya, insisto en que pienses en hacer terapia.

translation.en: I have an excellent colleague at the clinic. Specializes in grief.
translation.es: Tengo un colega excelente en la clínica. Se especializa en duelo.

translation.en: I don't need counseling.
Please, just tell me what he looked like.
- There's no stigma attached to it, Maya. - Judith.
He looked like what he was.
translation.es: Se veía como lo que era.

translation.en: Beautiful.
But a body.
Everything that made him Joe
was gone.
- All right, thank you. - Okay, mate.
Yep. All right. Yep.
Cheers. All right. Thanks. Yeah.
Oh, God.
A cat?
Yeah, from nowhere. It jumped out, I swerved.
translation.es: Sí, de la nada. Saltó, y di un volantazo.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I've hit a fence.
translation.es: Y, de golpe, choqué la cerca.

translation.en: - Are you okay? - Yeah, yeah, yeah. Not a scratch, unlike the car.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Sí. Ni un rasguño. El auto sí.

translation.en: - Can I have a replacement? - Most likely.
But, Sami, I'm just going to ask you this straight.
- Oh, come on, Pam. - You've had your challenges.
And I know you've risen to meet them, but we're all capable of--
translation.es: Sé que las has superado, pero todos podemos…

translation.en: One thousand, two hundred seventy- eight days sober.
translation.es: Mil doscientos setenta y ocho días sobrio.

translation.en: Do you know how long that is? Nearly three and a half years.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuánto es? Casi tres años y medio.

translation.en: - You're getting married. - And?
Oh, come on, Sami. Are you sure the wedding's not bringing back
translation.es: Vamos, Sami. ¿Estás seguro de que la boda no despertará

translation.en: unhappy memories of what happened last time?
translation.es: recuerdos tristes de lo que pasó la última vez?

translation.en: It was a cat.
It was an accident.
It was a complete freak event.
Okay, fine.
I'm partnering you up on the Joe Burkett case.
translation.es: Tendrás un compañero en el caso Burkett.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Come on.
Marty McGreggor. He's young, he's bright,
and he'll benefit from the wisdom of an older man.
translation.es: y le servirá la sabiduría de un hombre mayor.

translation.en: So I'm being babysat by a child?
Don't see it as babysitting.
- - See it as someone to help you avoid cats.
translation.es: Te ayudará a evitar los gatos.

translation.en: Oh my God, this is-- this is so exciting.
Sir, I'm really stoked to be…
You know, I think we'll be a really good team.
- Oh God. - I think-- Are you-- Are you stoked?
Just here. Yeah. Yes, yes, I'm stoked. Very stoked.
Margrete Corner.
This is where the attack happened. Do you know who Margrete was?
translation.es: Aquí ocurrió el ataque. ¿Sabes quién era Margrete?

translation.en: - Oh, a painter, was she? - No.
The ruler of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden in the 1300s.
translation.es: Gobernante de Dinamarca, Noruega y Suecia en el siglo XIV.

translation.en: Now, you're probably thinking…
- - …why does she have a corner
in a UK park?
Uh, yeah, why?
- Fuck knows. - Ah.
But she does.
And this is where Joe Burkett was murdered on the night of the 12th.
translation.es: Y aquí es donde asesinaron a Joe Burkett la noche del 12.

translation.en: The wife's statement's all we have to go on.
translation.es: Solo tenemos la declaración de la esposa.

translation.en: Come on.
You know she left the army under controversial circumstances?
translation.es: Dejó el ejército en circunstancias controvertidas.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It was a kind of a whistleblower thing, right?
translation.es: Sí. Tuvo que ver con un informante, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, she killed innocent civilians. Corey the Whistle leaked the details.
translation.es: Mató a civiles. Corey el Soplón filtró los detalles.

translation.en: - People wanted her in prison. I remember. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Querían que fuera a prisión. - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, and then-- then…
And then today, she claimed to see her dead husband alive.
translation.es: Y hoy dijo haber visto vivo a su esposo muerto.

translation.en: - What? - Yeah.
Nice me says,
she's in grief.
She lost her sister and her husband in a short period of time,
translation.es: Perdió a su hermana y a su esposo en poco tiempo,

translation.en: and she's seeing things. But…
…the cynical me says,
if she did do it, maybe she's trying to show us that she's losing it,
translation.es: que si fue ella, quizá quiera mostrar que está perdiendo la razón

translation.en: you know, to plead diminished responsibility.
Well… does she have a motive?
Well, you learn motive isn't always clear.
translation.es: Sabes que el motivo no siempre es claro.

translation.en: - You know, we dig. - Right.
- We find reasons. - Okay.
Oh, well, uh, rich family. I mean, Burkett Global Enterprises. Kerching!
Is she in line for a big payout?
Some life insurance.
But most of the money goes into trust for their daughter,
translation.es: Pero irá casi todo al fideicomiso de su hija,

translation.en: but that was all pre- agreed years ago.
So, well, maybe it is exactly as she says, you know.
Two kids on motorbikes.
Yeah. Yeah.
Which is why we need a ballistics check on her gun.
translation.es: Por eso debemos analizar su arma.

translation.en: Right.
Oh, but yeah. Okay, I'll get on it.
translation.es: Sí. Muy bien. Yo me encargo.

translation.en: Yeah. And while you're there, chase them up on the bullets.
translation.es: Sí. Y mientras estás ahí, insiste con las balas.

translation.en: I requested a matching review to see
if the killer's gun could be linked to any other incidents.
translation.es: entre el arma del asesino y otros incidentes.

translation.en: - Ballistics, bullets. Yes, Cap. - Hey, whoa.
translation.es: - Balística, balas. Sí, capitán. - Oye, espera.

translation.en: Don't. Never-- Never do that again. Just…
translation.es: No. Nunca vuelvas a hacer eso. Solo…

translation.en: No Cap.
What… What is that?
Oh, it's, uh, chocolate, whey protein, spinach, and a little bit of banana.
translation.es: Chocolate, suero de leche, espinaca y un poco de plátano.

translation.en: Did you want to…
- You should… - I should. Yeah, okay, well, I'll…
- I'll see you-- I'll see you back at-- - Yep.
God help me.
Hello, you reach Izabella. Please leave a message and I'll get back to you.
translation.es: Hola, soy Izabella. Deja un mensaje y te llamaré.

translation.en: Call Charlie.
- Hello? - Charlie, it's Maya.
Have you seen Izabella up your way?
Uh, yeah, I think I saw her come back a little while ago.
translation.es: Sí, la vi venir hace un rato.

translation.en: - Think she's at the house in the grounds. - All right. Okay. Thanks. Bye.
translation.es: - Creo que está en la casa de campo. - Bien. Gracias. Adiós.

translation.en: - - Come on then.
Yeah.
- Hi, Lily. Hi, Auntie Maya. - Hi, Dan. We haven't seen you in ages.
translation.es: - Hola, Lily. Hola, tía Maya. - Hola, Dan. Hace mucho que no te vemos.

translation.en: - Sorry, Auntie Maya. - Is your dad in?
- Yeah, just inside. - Yeah. Come on, then.
Hey.
There you go. Go and find Abby.
- Hey, Lily! Hello. -
Always amazing.
- Eddie. - All right.
Do you mind looking after Lily for me for an hour? I need to speak to someone.
translation.es: ¿Cuidarías a Lily por una hora? Debo hablar con alguien.

translation.en: Yeah, whatever.
- Auntie Maya! - Abby! Aw!
I'll come and see you today. Maybe second half.
translation.es: Iré a verte hoy. Quizá en la segunda mitad.

translation.en: - You don't need to. - No, I want to.
- How are you getting there? - How do you think?
What, with that in your hand?
One drink. I'm fine.
I don't drink and drive, Maya. It's one drink.
translation.es: No conduzco si bebo, Maya. Es solo un trago.

translation.en: It's bad enough that the kids are living in the house that their mum was killed in.
translation.es: Ya es malo que los niños vivan en la casa donde mataron a su madre.

translation.en: The boxes…
Let me take them out.
- I'm dealing with it. - Saying that for weeks.
translation.es: - Yo lo haré. - Hace semanas que dices eso.

translation.en: Well, maybe you'll understand when you start to throw Joe's stuff.
translation.es: Quizá lo entiendas al tirar las cosas de Joe.

translation.en: Know how it feels now, don't you?
Please, let me help.
- My wife, my problem. - Yeah, and my sister, Eddie.
translation.es: - Mi esposa, mi problema. - Sí, y mi hermana.

translation.en: I think that trumps marriage.
I know I wasn't here as much as she'd have liked.
translation.es: Sé que no estuve tanto como a ella le habría gustado.

translation.en: But you were off saving the world?
She hated you being away. You know that.
translation.es: Odiaba que estuvieras lejos. Lo sabes.

translation.en: She was worried every shithole conflict you went to would be your last,
translation.es: Temía que cada conflicto de mierda al que fueras pudiera ser el último,

translation.en: and one day she'd get a call telling her as much.
translation.es: y que un día la llamarían para avisarle.

translation.en: But it was the other way around.
Hiya.
- Hey. - Why are you at Farnwood?
I've been, uh, updating Judith. How's the nanny situation?
translation.es: Vine a actualizar a Judith. ¿Cómo va lo de la niñera?

translation.en: Right.
Well, I'm going to see Izabella now to talk about it.
translation.es: Estoy yendo a ver a Izabella para hablar.

translation.en: Asking what?
If she saw Joe.
- Why she took my SD card. - Come on, Maya.
translation.es: - Por qué tomó mi tarjeta SD. - Vamos.

translation.en: Listen, I know.
Maybe I am going crazy.
But she saw what I saw.
translation.es: Pero ella vio lo que vi yo.

translation.en: And now she won't even speak to me.
translation.es: Y ahora ni siquiera me habla.

translation.en: - Do you want me to come with you? - No, thanks.
All right, well, be careful.
He's gone, Maya.
You know that.
See you.
Izabella, it's Maya.
Will you just open the door?
Please. I just need to talk to you about Joe.
translation.es: Por favor. Solo quiero hablarte de Joe.

translation.en: I know you're in.
Izabella!
I can see your feet.
I'm sorry I grabbed you. I panicked. Just…
Just please open the door.
Ah, hi.
What's all this?
Oh yeah, they, uh-- they changed it. Don't know why.
translation.es: Sí, lo cambiaron. No sé por qué.

translation.en: It's awful.
It's a car.
It's green.
Looks like Kermit. Kermit vomit.
translation.es: Parece una rana. Vómito de rana.

translation.en: Feel free to walk home after dance lesson.
translation.es: Puedes caminar a casa luego de la clase.

translation.en: - I'd rather. - Do.
I will.
Very nice.
- That's it. - Disappointing.
- I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know the-- - I'll close up late.
translation.es: - Lo siento. No sé… - Yo llegué tarde.

translation.en: - Don't worry. - Thought it was lovely.
- You do know-- - Yeah, sure.
- You're making me look bad. - Yeah, yeah.
- That was bad. -
- Drag. Drag. - ♪ You're my symphony ♪
- Two, three, four. Slide. Slide. - ♪ You're the most supreme ♪
- Stop it. Stop. - Stop.
- I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. - Um…
- Sorry. -
How long till the wedding?
- Stop it. Don't laugh. -
- Four weeks. - Four weeks. Yeah.
We've got our work cut out.
Stop it, please. Please.
- - Sorry.
Don't give the ball away. Chase it. Chase it. Keep moving. Come on.
translation.es: No entregues la pelota. Síguela. Sigue corriendo. Vamos.

translation.en: Let's go.
- Go on, Abby! Go on! - Pretend it's a donut, Abby.
translation.es: - ¡Vamos, Abby! ¡Eso! - Piensa que es una dona, Abby.

translation.en: That'll get you moving. My granny could play better than you.
translation.es: Eso te hará correr. Mi abuela jugaba mejor.

translation.en: Move it. Faster, you bloody donkeys! Come on! Faster! Talk to each other! Come on!
Don't give it away!
Chase it! Quicker. Quicker. Come on!
Come on!
Abby, challenge! Challenge!
Awful.
- Ref! Number five. -
Abby, off.
Off!
Awful.
Woeful.
Maybe ease up on the cakes. Yeah? Your bulk's not helping.
translation.es: Come menos pasteles. ¿Sí? Tu peso no ayuda.

translation.en: - Hey! Coach. - Middle of a game here.
- Yeah, I'm Maya Stern. I'm Abby's aunt. - Maya, don't.
translation.es: Soy Maya Stern, la tía de Abby. - Maya, no. - Sí, sé quién es, capitana.

translation.en: Yeah, I know who you are, Captain.
translation.es: - Maya, no. - Sí, sé quién es, capitana.

translation.en: - I'm talking to you. - What?
They're kids. I'm ex- forces, and I've heard sergeant majors go easier.
translation.es: Son niñas. Soy exmilitar, los sargentos mayores nos trataban mejor.

translation.en: - They're embarrassing themselves. - No, no, you are.
- You can't speak to kids like that. - Who the hell are you? I'm a winner.
translation.es: No puede hablarles así. ¿Usted quién es? Yo, un ganador.

translation.en: - Oh my God. - Yeah? You want rainbows and bluebells?
Well, get her in the art club. Now, excuse me. I’m coaching a team.
translation.es: Que vaya al club de arte. Perdón. Dirijo un equipo.

translation.en: Okay, yeah. You're a rude man.
- Whatever. - Yeah.
- Don't turn your back on me. - Get off.
translation.es: - No me dé la espalda. - Váyase.

translation.en: I said, don't turn your back on me!
translation.es: ¡Dije que no me diera la espalda!

translation.en: Cunt.
- You fucking-- - Go on.
Give me an excuse to put you down.
translation.es: Deme una excusa para acabar con usted.

translation.en: - - Go on.
- Nah, you're not worth it. - Yeah, I thought so.
translation.es: - No, no vale la pena. - Sí, eso pensé.

translation.en: - Bye.  - Do one.
Come on, wake up!
You okay?
Yeah? Don't worry. Come on.
- Wait in the car, please. - Oh, here we go.
translation.es: - Espera en el auto. - Aquí vamos.

translation.en: - I don't want you around my children. - Oh, Eddie, come on. The guy was a bully.
translation.es: - No te acerques a mis hijos. - El tipo las maltrataba.

translation.en: It's not just that.
- You don't get it, do you? - No. Obviously I don't. No.
translation.es: - No lo entiendes, ¿no? - Se ve que no.

translation.en: The army. That incident.
Then Claire, now Joe.
Death follows you, Maya.
You sure you've only had that one drink?
You think I wasn't torn in half when my sister died?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no me destrozó la muerte de mi hermana?

translation.en: I wasn't even here, Eddie. They're her kids.
translation.es: Ni siquiera estaba aquí. Ellos son sus hijos.

translation.en: - They're all I have left of her. - Stay away.
translation.es: - Lo que me queda de ella. - Aléjate.

translation.en: - No, you can't do that! - You stay the fuck away!
In the car, please!
Dick.
So, I spoke with Sharon about the dress.
translation.es: Hablé con Sharon sobre el vestido.

translation.en: She said that this little fella will definitely show,
translation.es: Dijo que este amiguito sin duda se notará,

translation.en: but she said she can do some kind of,
I don't know, frill thing to conceal it a bit.
translation.es: no sé, como un volado para disimularlo.

translation.en: But everyone attending knows that you're pregnant, so…
translation.es: Pero todos los invitados saben que estás embarazada.

translation.en: It's our wedding day, Sami.
I want to look the blushing bride… - - …not like we're dashing down the aisle
translation.es: Quiero ser una novia resplandeciente, no parecer apurados

translation.en: because you managed to slip one past the goalie.
Yeah.
Hello?
What's up?
I'm sorry, it's just…
It's just this murder.
Plus, they gave me a partner.
Is that a bad thing?
Yes.
He's about three. A health nut.
Duran Duran came on the radio. He'd never even heard of them.
translation.es: Pasaron Duran Duran por la radio, y no los conocía.

translation.en: - What a bastard. - No, no.
Never heard of Duran Duran?
I'm not saying he should like them, not saying he should recite their lyrics,
translation.es: No digo que le guste ni que se sepa las letras,

translation.en: but he never even heard of them.
No, I agree. He should be fired immediately.
translation.es: No, estoy de acuerdo. Deberían despedirlo de inmediato.

translation.en: Come here, you big, daft bugger.
- Listen. -
It's a job, Sami.
An important job, but a job nonetheless.
translation.es: Uno importante, pero un trabajo al fin.

translation.en: Yeah. Yep, yep, yep.
Come here.
Two, thanks.
- Same again? - Yes.
- Some fresh-- - Yeah, no, I told him.
Hello?
Yo. It's Marty. I've, um, just sent you the ballistics report
translation.es: Le envié el informe de balística

translation.en: on the bullets that killed Joe Burkett. Have you got it?
translation.es: de las balas que mataron a Joe Burkett. ¿Le llegó?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I got it.
Yeah. You're not going to believe your eyes.
translation.es: Sí. No creerá lo que verá.

translation.en: BULLETS MATCH THOSE FROM A 9MM GLOCK 17 4TH GEN
translation.es: LAS BALAS COINCIDEN CON UNA GLOCK 17 DE 9MM 4.º GENERACIÓN

translation.en: - Who wants a hot dog? - Shane, got you this.
- Beer! - There you go. Here you are, Bono.
- Thank you. - When's your next tour kicking off?
- Two weeks now. - Two weeks?
- God, that's soon. - I know.
Gotta say, I'm glad you're not going back there.
translation.es: Me alegra que no vuelvas allí.

translation.en: Although if it wasn't for you, Brian wouldn't be here. So…
translation.es: Aunque Ben no estaría aquí de no ser por ti.

translation.en: - - Not sure whether that's a good thing.
translation.es: No sé si eso es algo bueno.

translation.en: - Oh! - No!
- I know what you're gonna do. - No? - Mm, yeah! -
translation.es: - Sé lo que vas a hacer. - ¿No? ¡Sí!

translation.en: - No! Shane! - Toast!
- For God's sake. - Toast!
- Come on in. Gather in. - I hate when he does this.
- Yes. Well, I wanted to thank you… -
…for having us bunch of degenerates over at your humble palace, maybe?
translation.es: por invitar a este grupo de degenerados a tu humilde… ¿palacio?

translation.en: And I think I speak for everybody when I say…
translation.es: Y creo que hablo por todos cuando digo

translation.en: …we've missed you loads, little sister.
- Thank you. - Haven't we?
Yeah.
Hey, stay strong.
- Oh, for God's sake, stop it! - Okay, okay, okay.
translation.es: - ¡Por el amor de Dios, basta! - Bien.

translation.en: - To Maya… - Sit down.
translation.es: Por Maya, la mejor piloto de helicóptero de combate con la que he volado.

translation.en: - …the best combat copter pilot I've ever flown with, our Captain.
translation.es: Por Maya, la mejor piloto de helicóptero de combate con la que he volado. Nuestra capitana.

translation.en: - To Maya! - Sit down.
And little Lily the hurricane!
- Cheers. - Cheers, mate.
Cheers. You okay?
- Stop it. - Stop what?
You. You're treating me like a widow.
translation.es: Me tratas como a una viuda.

translation.en: Maya, I hate to break it to you, but that's exactly what you are.
translation.es: Odio decírtelo, pero eso es lo que eres.

translation.en: Which is convenient, really, because you've always suited black.
translation.es: Es conveniente, el negro siempre te quedó bien.

translation.en: A big one.
I know this is going to sound crazy, Shane.
translation.es: Sé que esto parecerá una locura, Shane.

translation.en: But I keep thinking that I'm seeing him.
translation.es: Pero sigo pensando que lo veo.

translation.en: It's natural, Maya.
People do this all the time.
When you lose someone, it's like…
I dunno. It's like you still want them to be there, you know?
translation.es: No sé. Sigues queriendo que estuviera aquí.

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm going to sound even crazier now when I tell you this.
translation.es: Esto te parecerá aún más loco.

translation.en: I think I'm being followed. By who?
I don't know.
I've seen the same car twice.
translation.es: He visto el mismo auto dos veces.

translation.en: I've noted down the plate. It's a red Volkswagen.
translation.es: Anoté la matrícula. Es un Volkswagen rojo.

translation.en: - Do you think you can find the owner? - Not legally.
translation.es: ¿Podrías buscar al dueño? - No legalmente. - Pero puedes.

translation.en: Yeah, but you can.
Yeah, send it to me.
Thanks.
- Mother- in- law. - Good luck.
Hello?
Maya, what happened? Izabella's saying she won't work for you anymore.
translation.es: Maya, ¿qué pasó? Izabella dice que ya no trabajará para ti.

translation.en: She's here now.
Right, well, don't let her leave. I'll come over now, yeah? Keep her there.
translation.es: No dejes que se vaya. Iré ahora, ¿sí? Retenla ahí.

translation.en: - Shane-- - Look after Lily?
- Yeah. - Got you.
- Luka. - You attack her.
- Izabella! What'd you do with the SD card? - Fuck you. She's scared of you!
translation.es: ¡Izabella! ¿Qué hiciste con la tarjeta SD? - ¡Te tiene miedo! - Déjame pasar, o juro…

translation.en: Let me past, or I swear to God--
translation.es: - ¡Te tiene miedo! - Déjame pasar, o juro…

translation.en: - Leave her alone. - I just need to talk to her about Joe.
translation.es: - Déjala en paz. - Debo hablarle sobre Joe.

translation.en: - Leave her-- - She fucking pepper sprayed me!
Izabella!
You can't run from this!
Why did you let her leave?
What was I supposed to do? Keep her prisoner?
I needed to speak with her, Judith.
She says you attacked her.
- I didn't attack her. - You laid hands on her?
- Yes. - Then what's the difference, Maya?
- Why did you do that? - Why was she here?
Well, her family has been employed by ours for many years.
translation.es: Su familia trabajó muchos años para la nuestra.

translation.en: - Long before you came. - Oh, so you believe her?
translation.es: - Antes de que tú llegaras. - ¿Le crees?

translation.en: Does it matter that I was married to your son?
Does it matter that I'm the mother of your grandchild?
translation.es: ¿Importa que sea la madre de tu nieta?

translation.en: She says she caught you spying.
And did she tell you what I saw?
No. No.
I saw Joe.
I saw Joe, Judith.
Joe?
On the camera.
I don't know how, but that's what I saw.
translation.es: No sé cómo, pero es lo que vi.

translation.en: So answer me this.
How can a dead man appear on a secret camera?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sale un hombre muerto en una cámara oculta?

translation.en: How can-- How can a dead man cuddle his own daughter?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede un muerto abrazar a su propia hija?

translation.en: Stop it. Stop this.
Now, you know that can't be true.
translation.es: Sabes que eso no es posible.

translation.en: - You… wanted to see him… -
…so you saw him.
- And then you started accusing Izabella. - It wasn't a vision, Judith. He was there.
translation.es: - Y luego la acusaste a Izabella. - No fue una visión. Estaba ahí.

translation.en: Maya, it's your subconscious.
Don't fucking analyze me, Judith.
- Please don't swear in my home. - I know what I saw.
translation.es: - No me hables así. - Sé lo que vi.

translation.en: What, my dead son whom we buried?
I'm going to tell you the truth now, Maya. I'm worried about you.
translation.es: Te diré la verdad, Maya. Estoy preocupada por ti.

translation.en: All those things you went through when you were abroad.
translation.es: Pasaste por muchas cosas en el extranjero.

translation.en: - I'm fine. - You never dealt with them.
translation.es: - Estoy bien. - Nunca te trataste por eso.

translation.en: - Are you saying I'm going mad? - No, I'm saying you never dealt with them.
translation.es: - ¿Dices que enloquecí? - Digo que no te trataste por eso.

translation.en: Or the scandal that followed.
translation.es: Ni por el escándalo que siguió.

translation.en: And if I'm to be brutally honest,
I wonder whether you are in a fit state to be looking after that little girl right now.
translation.es: me pregunto si estás en condiciones de cuidar a esa niña.

translation.en: Don't you dare question my parenting.
translation.es: No te atrevas a cuestionarme como mamá.

translation.en: I saw him.
And I'm not going mad.
Did you love him, Maya?
What?
Simple question. My son, did you love him?
translation.es: Una pregunta simple. ¿Amabas a mi hijo?

translation.en: You know I did.
Because I did, to my core.
translation.es: Yo lo amaba hasta la médula.

translation.en: But sometimes, when you were together--
translation.es: Pero a veces, cuando estaban juntos…

translation.en: - I loved him! -
But if I'm honest, Judith…
I did often wonder,
was there a voice in his ear,
translation.es: si había una voz en su oído,

translation.en: a little voice…
saying, Is she good enough…
this bit of rough?
Was she really good enough for my special boy?
Because I'm not one of you.
translation.es: Porque no soy una de ustedes.

translation.en: Am I?
And I never will be.
Okay, come in.
Hiya.
We're just having a bit of a barbecue.
Maya, the, um, 9- millimeter bullets we recovered from your husband's body,
translation.es: Maya, balística analizó las balas de 9 milímetros que recuperamos

translation.en: we ran them through ballistics to see if the bullets matched
translation.es: del cuerpo de su esposo para ver si coincidían

translation.en: any of the cases on our database.
translation.es: con algún caso en nuestra base de datos.

translation.en: And they did.
They did.
The gun that killed your husband…
translation.es: El arma que mató a su esposo

translation.en: - was also used to kill your sister… -
translation.es: se usó para matar a su hermana,

translation.en: …Claire Walker.
